name: Captain Blimey and the Suspension of Timey
name_original: Captain Blimey and the Suspension of Timey
description:
Captain Blimey and the Suspension of Timey


Blimey, Captain Blimey! Just look at all those cannonballs!

As they get near, your powerful pirate senses start to kick in and time appears to slow down! Use the slowed time (along with your ability to jump 5 times) to help you achieve your as-of-yet-undefined goal!

Controls Arrow Keys Move Up Jump

Captain Blimey and the Suspension of Timey was made in 6 hours for Trijam #167. Thank you to everyone who played.
